name: Dongsuk Yook
content: Professor – KU Artificial Intelligence Laboratory Skip to content 육동석 교수 (DONGSUK YOOK) 2001 – present Professor, Department of Computer Science and Engineering, Korea University, Seoul, Korea 1999 – 2001 Senior Software Engineer, IBM T.J. Watson Research Center, New York, 1995 – 1999 Research Assistant, CAIP Center, Rutgers University, New Jersey, USA 1993 – 1993 Lecturer, Department of Computer Science and Engineering, Korea University, Seoul, Korea 1993 – 1999 Ph.D. in Computer Science, Rutgers University, New Jersey, USA 1991 – 1992 M.S. in Computer Science, Korea University, Seoul, Korea 1988 – 1990 B.S. in Computer Science, Korea University, Seoul, Korea Contact Room 511, Woojung Information and Communication Building, Korea University Science Campus, Anam-ro 145 (Anamdong 5-ga), Sungbookgoo, Seoul, Korea, 02841 Tel: (02) 3290-3202 E-mail: yook at ai.korea.ac.kr http://ai.korea.ac.kr/~yook
